title: [插件]关于ItemStack
author: Dogend
txt_content: 怎么把玩家手里的物品存到一个yml文件里

replies.author: Ir.Nep
replies.txt_content:
yml.set("节点", itemstack);
ItemStack item = yml.getItemStack("节点");复制代码
